content: **materials ** worsted weight yarn in your choice of christmas colors you can use two or three colors your choice if you use 2 colors you ll have rings instead of polka dots main color a = 4 ounces color b = 2 ounces color c optional = 1 ounce yarn needle direct pdf download link 1 >note in order to view the pattern in the direct pdf link you must have the latest adobe reader installed on your computer if not you will see only the cover page of terms of service this is an advanced pdf file and the actual pattern pages are listed on the left of the cover page all within the same pdf file 1 https //web archive org/web/20210126063329/http //priscillascrochet net/free%20patterns/x%20stockings/polka%20dot%20christmas%20stocking pdf
